definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: mocking, derision, (barbarous) stammering;—abs. ´[[ל]] Job 34:7 + 2 t. + Ps 123:4 (´[[הַל]] MT cstr. c. art.—so Kö:Synt. § 303e—but prob. insert [[לְ]] foll. Hup Now Bae, cf. also Ges:§ 127 g), + Ez Eze 23:32 (but del. LXXB Hi Co Berthol), + Eze 36:4 (where Co reads [[בלע]], but less prob., cf. Berthol); sf. [[לַעְגׇּם]] Ho 7:16 (v. infr.) pl. cstr. [[לַעֲגֵי]] Is 28:12 (v. infr.);—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: mocking, derision, Ps 123:4 (‖[[בוז]]); so appar. c. sf. as gen. obj. Ho 7:16 (but very dub., probably corrupt, cf. We Now); nearly = blasphemy Job 34:7.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = obj. of derision Ps 44:14 = Ps 79:4 (‖[[חרְפָּה]], [[קֶלֶס]]); so also Ez Eze 23:32 (‖[[חחק]]; si vera l., v. supr.), Eze 36:4.
stammerings (of barbarous language), [[שָׂפָה]] ´[[ל]] Is 28:11 (‖[[לָשׁוֹן]] [[אַחֶרֶת]]; so Ew Brd Di Hup-Now:Ps 35:16, De al. sub [[לָעֵג]]); but Gr:Monatsschr. 1884, 45 reads [[עלגי]], √ [[עלג]].
